|brand = Wistron NeWeb |model = DNUB-D38 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = (Pace) |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = June 17, 2017 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Wistron_NeWeb_DNUB-D38 |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = AN600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = USB |if_bus_version = 2.0 |ifconnector = (non-standard connector) |formfactor = <!-- Connector Form Factor, Leave blank for none -->
|vendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |device_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = NKR-DNUBD38, PGRHR44 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = A8:54:B2
|chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43238; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = none |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |802.11n = 300/300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->
|linuxdriv = |windriv =
|is_manuf = Yes |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |flags = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category =
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 04/06/2010 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== This module is ''[[Pace HR44-700]]'' digital video recorder (DVR).
==See also== *[[Wistron NeWeb DNUB-B1]] ([[WNC]]) - BCM4323 :NKR-DNUB-B1 (2010-05-27) - ''802.11agn 2x2 USB WI-FI Module'' *[[Wistron NeWeb DNUB-E1]] ([https://fccid.io/document.php?id=2822272 Epson]) - BCM43236B (2x SKY2577L) :BKMAFDNUB-E1 (2015-11-30) - ''802.11abgn USB Adapter'' *[[Wistron NeWeb DNUB-F1]] :FCC ID: NKR-F1 (2015-06-25) - ''802.11abgn 2x2 USB Module'' *[[Wistron NeWeb DNUB-O1]] :FCC ID: NKR-O1 (2014-05-03) - ''802.11abgn 2x2 USB Module'' *[[Wistron NeWeb DNUB-S1]] (Samsung) :A3LDNUBS1 (2010-04-06) - ''WLAN Transmitter Module'' *[[Wistron NeWeb DNUB-S234B]] (Samsung) :A3LDNUBS234B (2012-01-27) - ''Wi-Fi Module'' *[[Wistron NeWeb DNUB-S236]] (Sharp) :FCC ID: NKR-S236 (2013-09-13) - ''802.11abgn USB Module'' *[[Wistron NeWeb DNUR-W1]] :NKR-DNURW1 (2014-11-05) - ''802.11bgn USB Module'' *[[Wistron NeWeb DNUA-PO1]] :NKR-DNUAPO1 (2014-09-04) - ''802.11n 2x2 USB Module'' *[[Wistron NeWeb DNUR-SM1]] :NKR-SM1 (2014-08-29) - ''802.11abgn 2x2 USB WiFi Module''
